ResourceHeader.ResourceName: MMS 4 Fast Plasma Investigation, Dual Ion Spectrometer (FPI, DIS) Instrument Distributions, Burst Survey
ResourceHeader.Description: FPI usually operates in Fast Survey (FS) Mode in the MMS Region Of Interest (ROI) for the current Mission Phase. Data are taken at burst (30/150 ms for DES/DIS) resolution in this mode. Data are also made available at survey (4.5 s, etc) resolution; these form a separate product from this. Per mission design, not all burst-resolution data are downlinked. This product contains phase-space distribution maps of those burst-resolution data selected for downlink. In particular, the (highest possible quality at the time of release) corrected/converted "Burst SkyMap" distributions are reported with time-stamps and other annotation characterizing the state of the instrument system at the indicated time.

InformationURL.Name: The Magnetospheric Multiscale (MMS) Mission home page at Goddard Space Flight Center (GSFC)
InformationURL.Description: The Magnetospheric Multiscale (MMS) Mission Home Page hosted by the Goddard Space Flight Center (GSFC).

InformationURL.Name: The MMS Scientific Investigation, SMART, home page at Southwest Research Institute (SwRI)
InformationURL.Description: The Magnetospheric Multiscale (MMS) Scientific Investigation home page. The MMS Scientific Investigation is called Solving Magnetospheric Acceleration, Reconnection, and Turbulence (SMART). The web page is hosted by the Southwest Research Institute (SwRI).

InformationURL.Name: Data Caveats and Current Release Notes at LASP MMS SDC
InformationURL.Description: The Magnetospheric Multiscale (MMS) Mission home page hosted by the Laboratory of Atmospheric and Space Physics, Science Data Center (LASP, SDC) at the University of Colorado, Boulder.

AccessURL.Description: In CDF via ftp from SPDF.

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: J. Burch, C. Pollock. Please acknowledge the data providers and CDAWeb when using these data.

Parameter.Name: Epoch Time
Parameter.Description: Epoch Time Tags in Terrestrial Time 2000 (TT2000)
Parameter.Caveats: MMS4 FPI/DIS burst data begin-time; derived from burst packet time. This parameter exhibits an increasing monotonic progression.

Parameter.Name: Data Quality Error Flags
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Vector of Data Quality Indicators at Burst Start Time
Parameter.Caveats: Value of zero signifies no quality errors. For non-zero values: Bit-0 = manually flagged interval, Bit-1 = overcounting/saturation effects likely present in skymap

Parameter.Name: Compression Flag
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Compression Lossless/lossy Indicator at Survey Start Time

Parameter.Name: Step Table Parity
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Caveats: FPI/DIS alternates between two tables, designated even (0) and odd (1).

Parameter.Name: Start Del-Phi Spin Phase Count
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Del-Phi (Observation Spin Phase) Count at Burst Start Time
Parameter.Caveats: Nominally, spin-phase counts range over [0000, 5759] cnts. Each count represents 1/16 deg of observatory spin-phase. Zero spin-phase count indicates obs +X-axis aligned with Sun.

Parameter.Name: Start Del-Phi Spin Phase Angle
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Del-Phi (Observation Spin Phase) Angle at Burst Start Time
Parameter.Caveats: Nominally, spin-phase angles range over [0, 360) deg. Each count represents 1/16 deg of observatory spin-phase. Zero spin-phase angle indicates obs +X-axis aligned with Sun.

Parameter.Name: Sky Map Azimuth Angles
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Burst Survey Sky Map Instrument Azimuth Angles

Parameter.Name: Sky Map Ion Phase Space Density Distribution
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Caveats: Az bin: sector ind=00 looks after (spin-phase) Sun, ..., sector ind=31 looks before Sun dir. Head field-of-view: pixel index=00 looks to zenith, ..., pixel index=15 looks to nadir. FPI operations nominally bin data from 64 energy filters into 32 pairwise energy bins, indexed 0-31. Nominally, bins are indexed in increasing energy order. See FPI docs for details.

Parameter.Name: Sky Map Ion Phase Space Density Distribution Error
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Caveats: Az bin: sector ind=00 looks after (spin-phase) Sun, ..., sector ind=31 looks before Sun dir. Head field-of-view: pixel index=00 looks to zenith, ..., pixel index=15 looks to nadir. FPI operations nominally bin data from 64 energy filters into 32 pairwise energy bins, indexed 0-31. Nominally, bins are indexed in increasing energy order. See FPI docs for details.

Parameter.Name: Sector Despin P Value
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Sector Despin P Value, this Burst
Parameter.Caveats: Records P-value used to de-spin this burst sky-map on board. See FPI docs for details.

Parameter.Name: Sector Index
Parameter.Description: Azimuth Sector Index used in some Types of Outputs
Parameter.Caveats: Azimuth bin: sector index=00 looks after (spin-phase) Sun, ..., sector index=31 looks before Sun dir.

Parameter.Name: Pixel Index
Parameter.Description: Pixel Index used in some Types of Outputs
Parameter.Caveats: Head field-of-view: pixel index=00 looks to zenith, ..., pixel index=15 looks to nadir.

Parameter.Name: Energy Index
Parameter.Description: Energy Bin Index used in some Types of Outputs
Parameter.Caveats: FPI operations nominally bin data from 64 energy filters into 32 pairwise energy bins, indexed 0-31. Nominally, bins are indexed in increasing energy order. See FPI docs for details.

Parameter.Name: Zenith Angles
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: MMS4_DIS_PIXEL_INDEX_BRST

Parameter.Name: Sky Map Energies
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: MMS4_DIS_ENERGY_INDEX_BRST
Parameter.Caveats: Odd energies (parity 1) in the 64-step FPI energy table

Parameter.Name: Sky Map Energies
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: MMS4_DIS_ENERGY_INDEX_BRST
Parameter.Caveats: Even energies (parity 0) in the 64-step FPI energy table
